description: Dart source code for a Flutter splash screen widget, 'SplashScreen', which displays an animated logo and transitions to 'HomeShell' after a delay.

classes.name: SplashScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the splash screen with custom animations and transition to the home screen.

classes.name: _SplashScreenState
classes.description: State class managing animations and transition logic for SplashScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes animation controllers, sets up animations, and schedules navigation to the home screen after delay.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the animation controller to free resources.

methods.name: _buildLogo
methods.description: Builds the animated logo widget with scaling and fading effects.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the full splash screen UI with background effects, logo, and text.
